description: Single storey rear and part single and part two storey extension to side and side / rear of house
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Adopted Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Policies B1, H8, H9 and Replacement UDP Policies 5.5, 5.9. | The flat roof to be created shall not be used to form a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area.  REASON:	To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with Adopted Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Policies B1, B5, H33 and Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 5.5, 5.9. | The extension permitted shall not be used or occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 18 Birkbeck Avenue.  REASON:	To ensure that the character of the area is preserved and a separate dwelling is not created, in accordance with Adopted Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Policies B1, B5, H8, H9, H11, H26 and Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 5.5, 5.6, 5.9.
